google: `@n google [search|image] <search term>` searches google search or images for the search term.
wolfram: `@n [wolf|wolfram] <wolfram query>]` displays wolfram results calculated from the query terms.
cleverbot: `@n [cleverbot|cb] <phrase>` display the cleverbot reply to phrase.
audioGeneral: `@n [audio|a] <additional commands>` executes an audio command. Additional commands...
audioPlay: `[play|p] <search term or link>` searches youtube for the term or link and plays audio from that video
audioStop: `[stop|s]` bot leaves channel, stops playing audio
audioSkip: `[skip|sk]` skips the next item in queue
help: `@n help` lists information about this bots commands. You just used this command.
